list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a utensil consisting of a wire or plastic mesh held in a frame, used for straining solids from liquids, for separating coarser from finer particles, or for reducing soft solids to a pulp.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: puree the potatoes through a sieve
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: xay nhuyễn khoai tây thông qua một cái rây

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: put (a food substance or other material) through a sieve.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: sieve the flour and sugar together in a bowl
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: rây bột và đường với nhau trong một cái bát
